overview: They say there's a thin line between love and hate, and Lesbian Rivals does nothing to dispel that myth. Watch as these beautiful lesbians go at each other with anger and rage, only to have it turn into insatiable, burning lust. A slap is not just a slap when Kylie Ireland is administrating the pain to Nica Noelle, and Heather Silk learns the hard way what happens when a little Miss Know it All goes too far. Starring Sinn Sage, Holly Wellin, Samantha Ryan, Heather Silk, Nica Noelle and Kylie Ireland.
title: Rivals
